events_categories.title: 1. Shepherd and The Lost Sheep: A Motherless Child
events_categories.description: A Motherless Child – a gripping contemporary thriller novel that immerses readers in the tumultuous world of Tinashe, a young orphan entangled in a whirlwind of corruption. Follow Tinashe's journey as he navigates a society plagued by deceit, power struggles, and hidden agendas. As a motherless child, Tinashe's vulnerabilities become both his greatest strength and his most significant challenge. With an unyielding spirit and a relentless pursuit of truth, he uncovers a web of secrets that threaten to consume him.
